definition[0]: a public meeting where land, buildings, paintings etc are sold to the person who offers the most money for them
note[0]: auction house (=a company that arranges auctions)
example[0]: This week 14 of his paintings were put up for auction.
example[1]: The house was sold at auction.
definition[1]: to sell something at an auction
example[2]: Sotheby’s estimated that its Impressionist paintings auction would take in about $80 million.
example[3]: The buildings will be sold at auction next month.
definition[2]: to offer something for sale in an auction
example[4]: The house was put up for auction.
definition[3]: to offer something for sale at an auction
example[6]: Fleet arranged to auction off the company’s inventory and equipment.
